title: Neural Search Engine
summary: High-dimensional vector search optimized for semantic queries on edge devices.
problem: Traditional keyword search fails to capture semantic meaning, while existing vector search solutions are too heavy for edge device deployment. We needed a lightweight, low-latency semantic retrieval system for mobile clients with limited compute budgets.

architecture.title: Embedding Generation
architecture.description: Distilled BERT model quantized to int8, running on ONNX Runtime for 4x faster inference.

architecture.title: Vector Indexing
architecture.description: Custom HNSW implementation optimized for memory locality, reducing cache misses by 30%.

architecture.title: Reranking
architecture.description: Lightweight cross-encoder pass on top-k results to improve precision without latency penalty.

title: Alpha-Trade Bot
summary: Reinforcement learning agent for high-frequency cryptocurrency arbitrage.
problem: Cryptocurrency markets exhibit micro-inefficiencies that can be exploited with fast-acting automated systems. Built to test RL strategies in live trading conditions.

architecture.title: Market Data Ingestion
architecture.description: WebSocket connections to 5 major exchanges with sub-10ms latency.

architecture.title: Signal Detection
architecture.description: PPO-based agent trained on historical spread data.

architecture.title: Execution Engine
architecture.description: Rate-limited order placement with slippage management.

title: Distributed Cache
summary: Custom in-memory key-value store with eventual consistency protocol.
problem: Needed a lightweight caching layer that could handle partition tolerance in edge deployments.
